amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize the STEM Gateways grant program as an allowable use of flexible funding received by state educational agencies which would allow States to award grants to LEAs and qualified partner organizations to support the success of women, minorities, and low-income students in rigorous STEM academics.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 217 (Roll no. 95).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 217 (Roll no. 95).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Kennedy.
